attributes.action: Kingdom Hearts II: Final Mix United Kingdom Release
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is about making kingdom hearts 2 final mix come out in the United Kingdom. The more people that will sign this petition the more chance we will get that Kingdom Hearts 2 final mix will be release in the UK.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
